summary: This script utilizes bash and xdotool to move the mouse cursor to coordinates 500, 500 and perform a left click. The DISPLAY environment variable is set to ":3" to specify the X server for the graphical user interface (GUI) operation.

details.comment: This script utilizes bash and xdotool to move the mouse cursor to coordinates 500, 500 and perform a left click. The DISPLAY environment variable is set to ":3" to specify the X server for the graphical user interface (GUI) operation.
